title: Strengthening App Development Practical Competencies: Workshop on Designing Mixed Reality-Based Situated Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced-level specialized knowledge in the field and extensive practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design language learning scenarios applying situational learning theory in a mixed reality environment
Learners can analyze core components (interface, content, interaction) of virtual learning environments utilizing MR technology
Learners can prototype a practical MR environment for language learning through project-based assessment
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
